definitions.definition: To bite or chew loudly or heavily.
definitions.example: The dog chomped on the treat and swallowed it in one gulp.

definitions.definition: (Perl) To remove the final character from (a text string) if it is a newline (or, less commonly, some other programmer-specified character).
An incompetent person, a blockhead; a loser.
definitions.example: That chump wouldn't know his ass from a hole in the ground.

definitions.definition: A gullible person; a sucker; someone easily taken advantage of; someone lacking common sense.
definitions.example: It shouldn't be hard to put one over on that chump.

definitions.definition: The thick end, especially of a piece of wood or of a joint of meat.
